message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I believe a price of $1,100,000 is fair. What do you think?
I appreciate your time, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value to me.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but I believe the product's value warrants a higher price. I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,050,000. This offer reflects the true worth of the product.

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I still think $900,000 is a more reasonable price for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $950,000. I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.
